website_summaries.verdict: Well-made shoe trees that are only edged out slightly by our top pick.
pros: Manufactured by a top name in the shoe industry
Built to last out of solid red cedar
cons: These run somewhat wide, making it challenging to select an accurate size

customer_reviews.title: Keeps shoes from sagging.
customer_reviews.text: Prevents sag to retain my leather shoe's shape and the cedar smell keeps it fresh. If you have trouble knowing what size to get, this is what florshiem website states for the sizes: small (6-8) medium (8-10), large (10-12), XL (12-14), and XXL (13-15).
customer_reviews.author: J. Alcaide

customer_reviews.title: Go for the Florsheim brand...
customer_reviews.text: I have several pairs of these that I've had for over fifteen years. The springs are still strong enough to hold my shoes in great shape. You can buy cheaper shoe trees and replace them in a couple of years when they break down (if you're lucky). Or you can just not waste your time and money and go with the Florsheim brand. You'll see the quality when you unbox them. Ps. Here's a hint: sand them with a medium-fine sand paper every year or so and it will renew that great cedar smell and the moisture absorptive quality of the cedar.
customer_reviews.author: Ron In SD

customer_reviews.title: NOT what is pictured
customer_reviews.text: What I received IS OT at all what is pictured, Plastic at heel and not as advertised. Very disapointed
customer_reviews.author: 996driver

customer_reviews.title: Its made from cedar wood.
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box, one of them was cracked where the pin was pushed through that holds the rod in place. Right now it doesnt seem to be an issue, but I'm giving it a week to adjust to temperature. These shoe inserts are not design to stretch the inside widths or lengths. Its held in place by a spring loaded rod which seem to hold the form of the shoes only. If ur looking for something to alter the size of ur shoes this device isn't it. So I will give it a week to see if it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: J. B. Barbour

customer_reviews.title: Size 12 Florsheim Men's Woodward Cedar Shoe Tree
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoe tree, very well constructed and designed. The shoe tree are a smoothly shaped cedar and split toe simulated to the shape of a foot. I am very happy with my purchase and trust the Brand Name Florsheim.
customer_reviews.author: oscar

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is supposed to do-works
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. Good quality. I bought one first to make sure that they were true to size and that the quality was good. Everything checked out so I ordered 2 more. Good product
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Florsheim Men's Woodard Cedar Shoe Tree, Cedar Large
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product 4 Stars because of a good brand name, these cedar shoe trees are well made but they are so tight that they are hard to pull out of the shoe. The shoe trees are well priced, nice width and moderate arch support but just hard to pull out of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: oscar

customer_reviews.title: Fit well, not clear if a difference between Left and Right.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one pair to check out the fit etc, once happy, I bought another 3 pairs. Some of the trees have an "L" imprinted on the underside, which you might think means "Left". However I bought 4 pairs => 8 shoe trees. 6 of them have the L. There isn't an obvious difference between them, so I'm not sure if they are intended to have a Right and a Left. In any case, they do the job and hopefully will add to the longevity of my shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Lenny

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, but longevity may be an issue
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to keep the pairs of shoes i wear at my office from creasing too much. After a couple of months, its starting to splinter, the Cedar definitely keeps some of the funky smell out of my shoe during summer months. Although i do question the longevity of this product, the splinters are a serious issue as I only discovered them after they were stuck in my foot,
customer_reviews.author: K. M.

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: These shoe trees are an excellent bargain investment in your shoe collection- well constructed and easy to use. The cedar has a wonderful scent. The vendor securely packaged them and delivered them at warp speed. Well done!
customer_reviews.author: Socrates

customer_reviews.title: Work great and smell nice, but perhaps a tad wide for the average shoe
customer_reviews.text: These smell really nice and seem well made. They also quite obviously do their job as expected. Them being my first shoe trees I'm by no means an expert on them, yet I do want to note that they might be slightly wide for your average shoe. I have relatively wide feet and they still seem to push a bit on the edges.
customer_reviews.author: Philosobuff

customer_reviews.title: Don't be afraid order
customer_reviews.text: Love these after they came in. Was worried about them but once I got my first set and saw how well they are made ordered my second set that day. About to order a third set since they are so good. Order I don't think you will be disappointed. I felt like they were a little under priced for how good they where(they raised the price up a few days after I ordered my first set as I ordered my second set and they where a bit higher in price).
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Good value, but depending on your shoe you may want to reconsider.
customer_reviews.text: Inserted into my common projects achilles low, and they would often get stuck inside. It would be extreeeemely difficult to remove once inserted, and it would require regular attempts to jerk it out. Otherwise, for my dress shoes it seems to have little issue, but still requires some force to remove. I would recommend another tree instead of this one by spending a little bit more.
customer_reviews.author: Abraham Gozali

customer_reviews.title: perfect, fit as expected, do the job of keeping shoes in perfect shape
customer_reviews.text: perfect, fit as expected, do the job of keeping shoes in perfect shape and giving the ma little stretch. Better than most other products ts I tried. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Ernie New Zealand

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size.
customer_reviews.text: It is a quality product made of cedar as advertised. It is thicker and sturdier than similar products I have purchased. I wear an 11 1/2. I bought a large according to the size chart. However, I should have purchased the medium. These things are so big, it’s hard getting them into and out of my shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher A.

customer_reviews.title: A lot better than some other's I've tried.
customer_reviews.text: After the last pair of shoe trees I bought (which were too large) these fit much better. The spring construction on them works nicely. I don't feel like they are stretching out my shoe, but they help keep the shape well enough. I wished they were just a tad larger in in top of the toe area, but beggers can't be choosers. Overall, definitely think these will work out great. I bought 2 of them.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Easily the best shoe trees
customer_reviews.text: A lot of the shoe trees are the same, but I really liked these ones in particular. They fill out the shoe well, particularly in the heel portion. These will add years of life to my dress shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Han

customer_reviews.title: Great like the first 2 I got
customer_reviews.text: These are my 3rd one and they are just as great as the first 2. My only complaint was that there was a little chip on the inside of one of them. It's hardly noticeable and doesn't affect it's usability so I decided not to return them. I only bring it up so that they are aware and can pack them a little more carefully, but things happen.
customer_reviews.author: Anton

customer_reviews.title: As expected a great product.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product before & find it to continue to be a superior choice.
customer_reviews.author: R.

customer_reviews.title: Great at the sale price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for $12.90 per pair through Amazon with free prime shipping. They are a great value at that price but there is no way I would pay $25.95 for them. For their regular price there are other brands that have a lot better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Roger JonesTop Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 9 1/2 shoe and these shoe trees will not open up to fit the toe area. These are size M to fit 8W -10M
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: The trees would be fine if they arrived undamaged
customer_reviews.text: The trees would be fine if they arrived undamaged, the metal beam holding the front to the heel was bent and cannot contract to fit smaller shoes correctly. Additionally there are some minor chips in the wood that aren't cool. I do like the handle over the heel, that's a generally good design. Didn't bother asking for a refund or replacements, too much work, the company requires you to ship them back first, no thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: You’ve found the right ones.
customer_reviews.text: All you’ll ever need right here. Simple design, expand to fit properly, robust spring mechanism. Florsheims are my go-to shoe trees.
customer_reviews.author: Joe C

customer_reviews.title: They're so fancy !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Shoe tree fit my shoes size 12 1/2, and it would have fit a 13 easily as they are spring loaded for multi-dimensional expansion. The fancy mechanism in the front splits the tree to fill in the front and push it outward as well as frontward. The place where your index and middle finger can grab the tree inside the shoe is a very nice touch to help you brush and polish your shoes. Classy !
customer_reviews.author: Adipatus Sutapida

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: High quality product. Very happy with my purchase. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: cmack

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Well made, good fit in my 11's. No issues with the wood. Excellent packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo

customer_reviews.title: Great if you have two right feet
customer_reviews.text: The heels are a little narrow, but the bigger issue is that they don't seem to match the shoe trees in left/right pairs when shipping. Multiple reviews have mentioned having more of one or the other, and the same happened to me - they shipped two right foot shoe trees. Will be replacing these when I get better shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Evan S.

customer_reviews.title: Just like "downtown" ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly like last pair I bought at Florsheim many years ago. Fits the shoes exactly as they should -- just enough pressure to keep the toe of the shoe from curling up, yet not so much that the size is stretched. Thanks you for finding these.
customer_reviews.author: RowBear

customer_reviews.title: Wood in a shoe, straight from the tree
customer_reviews.text: Absolutly perfect product. Does what its supposed to at the right price
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Premium Quality from Florsheim.
customer_reviews.text: Well crafted cedar wood trees for your shoes. Keeps them fresh and in shape. Highly Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Alan M. Collopy

customer_reviews.title: Quality shoe trees.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought at least 6 different brands of shoe trees to see which ones I like the best. These Florsheim trees are by far the best. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expected higher quality construction
customer_reviews.text: Heel ends are different heights, the left one sticks out the top of the shoe, the right one sits flush with the back of the heel. The metal adjuster components feel flimsy/loose, and do not slide as smoothly as i would have expected....
customer_reviews.author: J. Jakubczyk II

customer_reviews.title: Cedar Shoe Trees-Skip Over Any Cheaper Models
customer_reviews.text: I think these shoe trees are excellent quality, have a great aroma, fit well, so far, in 3 of my 8 boots and should hold up for a long time. I would definitely recommend them over cheaper brands and esp. over any plastic type which could easily snap as you have to give a good push to lock these in place. I really am glad I bought these.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Reiff

customer_reviews.title: Stiff spring mechanism
customer_reviews.text: The spring mechanism is too tight or stiff. Doesn't release easily when inside a shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Thompson

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: Smell very good and seems to be doing an ok job, but the label fell off the Same day I used. I just hope this is the only thing that fails for now
customer_reviews.author: John Perez

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for husband
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my husband at his request. Cedar shoe trees are always very nice for keeping shoes fresh. These are very nice quality. They did take longer to arrive than expected but that may have been due to the Christmas shipping season.
customer_reviews.author: Eanderson

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. I am more than pleased with how these do. I had some shoes that had a squeak that wouldn't go away. These shoe trees were able to dry it out enough for the squeak to stop. I'm considering buying another for other pairs of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Dunahee

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than the one-sized fits all notes would leave you ...
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than the one-sized fits all notes would leave you to believe. I am a size 10.5 and these are probably a full size too small.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Wish they were spring loaded. If you don't get the exact right size then they'd be worthless.
customer_reviews.author: San Diego Robert

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly into my dress shoes. These help retain ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly into my dress shoes. These help retain the original appearance of the shoes and prevent the wrinkles and deformations that come with use over time.
customer_reviews.author: Myron Thornberry

customer_reviews.title: Quality Florsheim product
customer_reviews.text: Good quality cedar shoe trees. Will help shoes last a long time. Never buy plastic ones, they don’t absorb moisture.
customer_reviews.author: Stylish senior

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: use the to help break in my new florsheim shoes stretched the good enough that they weren't hurting my feet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works like it should
customer_reviews.text: They fit in easily and are not difficult to remove. I suggest that you only use on a shoe that has room by the heel so you avoid scraping the back side of the shoe's inner material.
customer_reviews.author: Froghatten

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe tree - high quality
customer_reviews.text: Have had this shoe tree for 2 years and they're holding up great. Will continue to buy these for my other shoes. I especially like that the back part, which pushed against the back part of the shoe, is wide enough to not deform the curvature of the rear of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: TPop

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made
customer_reviews.text: Well built out of cedar. They fit all my shoes correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Diamond-D

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: I like it....just what I needed to protect my investment (solid black Oxfords.) Would buy again for other pairs of dress shoes as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Leia I.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, doesn't fit a size 13 though
customer_reviews.text: They are not as snug as I would like in my size 13 Florsheim Imperials, but they still work for the most part. Its hard to make a shoetree that will fit all the way from a size 9 to a 13, so I am only deducting one star.
customer_reviews.author: L. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Well made, fits right.
customer_reviews.text: The size chart makes no sense, but that's Amazon's fault. Check the Florsheim website first.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. Wonderful Cedar Smell
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful Cedar smell when you open the box. Placed them in my Allen Edmonds, and they are doing the job as advertised. Couldn't be happier.

customer_reviews.title: Cedar trees
customer_reviews.text: Shoe trees are perfect especially for the price. And I like that the packaging was minimal.

customer_reviews.title: I would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a set, liked them and bought another pair the next day.

customer_reviews.title: Hey, love some good shoe trees
customer_reviews.text: I mean... these aren't shoes. They are great show trees and the large fits my shoes which vary between 11.5-12.5 in size. I think they're great. Still, do not try and wear as shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Link

customer_reviews.title: Almost 5 stars...
customer_reviews.text: They are slightly difficult to get out of the shoe - my only complaint though! Otherwise they are great - I used the size chart on the Florsheim web site to order the appropriate size.
customer_reviews.author: A Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Good cedar shoe tree
customer_reviews.text: Fits inside my size 9 shoes to keep the shape and reduce creases. Good amount of cedar to absorb any moisture and keep them smelling great. I'd buy more when they're on sale.
customer_reviews.author: highly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality! Worked as expected! Recommend and would purchase again!

customer_reviews.title: Nice product!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my shoes from getting crushed in luggage. They insert easily and are hinged where the metal bracket attaches to the front foot portion so you can even insert them into boots if you like.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: use daily. just have to look to make sure it is going in the right shoe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: It would be nice if they filled the width of the shoe toward ...
customer_reviews.text: It would be nice if they filled the width of the shoe toward the toe more, but they still do a good job in my 13 shoe. I'm satisfied.

customer_reviews.title: Price wasn't too terrible either.
customer_reviews.text: Just barely fit in my size 11 men's shoes. Overall, exactly what I wanted though. Price wasn't too terrible either.

customer_reviews.title: Hard
customer_reviews.text: Average quality at an average price. Nordstrom’s store brand is cheaper (at the Rack) and better quality.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I have two sets for my two pairs of work oxfords. I keep them in the shoes when they are not being worn. I went to the Florsheim website to get the correct sizing information before ordering.

customer_reviews.title: to long.
customer_reviews.text: Was to long would not fit in size 10 shoe.

customer_reviews.title: These are great. Florsheim is a respectable brand
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Florsheim is a respectable brand. This is good quality for a good price. This is the 2nd pair I have bought already.

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed that I received the wrong shoe trees
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that I received the wrong shoe trees. The shoe trees I received were not split and the heels were plastic.

customer_reviews.title: rather flimsy and ill fitting for dress shoes, it's ...

customer_reviews.title: ... shoe trees before and these are hands down my favorite. They slide in with ease
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased shoe trees before and these are hands down my favorite. They slide in with ease, extend, and keep my boots looking great. They are a smart investment for anyone with shoes and boots they want to keep looking good.

customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product. I ordered Large (10 -12), it arrived today and it is so small that it falls out of my shoe which is size 11

customer_reviews.text: The shoe trees fit as expected. Very pleased over all, will be buying another pair for my dress shoes.

customer_reviews.text: These are solid shoe trees that are easy to put in and take out. They work very well and I have re-ordered more pairs frequently as I have purchased additional shoes.

customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! Florsheim is overlabeling the ROCHESTER SHOE TREE COMPANY as the OEM. These are high quality and made in the USA! Go USA!

product_meta.title: Florsheim Men's Woodard Cedar Shoe Tree
product_meta.description: In 1892, Milton Florsheim began producing shoes in a small factory located in Chicago, Illinois. The first pairs of Florsheim shoes made by Milton and his father, Sigmund, were a remarkable combination of style, comfort and high quality workmanship. This tradition continues today with the Florsheim family's commitment to producing trend-right, high quality footwear. Florsheim shoes are always available in a wide range of sizes and widths.
feature_bullets: ADDED WEAR: Florsheim Aromatic Red Cedar Shoe Trees portect the leather, fabric, stitching and soles from moisture damage, adding to their life.
COMFORT: is what you expect from your shoes. Florsheim Aromatic Red Cedar Shoe Trees smooth out linings and insoles, making shoes more comfortable to wear.
APPEARANCE: Florsheim Aromatic Red Cedar Shoe Trees smooth out creases and wrinkles that prematurely age leather.
FIT: these shoe trees come in sizes Small (size 6.5 wide to 8.5 medium), Medium (size 8 wide to 10 medium), Large (sizes 9.5 wide to 11.5 medium), and Extra Large (size 11 wide to 14 medium).
